name: nonscientific
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not relating to science: This approach works in nonscientific areas as well. His next book will be on a nonscientific subject.
not using the organized methods of science: We made a nonscientific survey of thirty European cities. Before we go any further, let's do a quick, non-scientific assessment of where things stand. Compare
anti-scientific
unscientific
More examplesFewer examplesIt is hard to explain how the machine works in non-scientific language.Her approach appeals to many nonscientific readers.I am coming at this from a non-scientific angle.
